section.title: Coverage
section.para:
GeotoolKit uses Java standard API for image processing.
Image describes storage method and color space.
Coverages add georeferencing informations and metadata.

section.title: Batch handling
section.para: Only one model know managing multi-coverage in the same time : Coverage-SQL (or PostGrid). However, this model hasn't interface and fait le lien avec un mode de stockage qui lui est propre. A new interface, CoverageStore, is being developped in Geotoolkit for resolve these problems.
